Name: DepthViewer
About the game: Creates 3D VR scenes from 2D input using depth estimation machine learning model. Takes any images or videos, estimates the depth using MiDaS model, and draws it in the 3D space for your VR HMD! You can save the depthmap output to use it later, record a 3D VR video to upload on Youtube. This program also can fetch the screen of your desktop and show the depth.
